text: (playful music)
(cell phone rings)
- Hi, Cherie.
- Hey, Bill.
We're ready to launch AWS IoT SiteWise.

- I can't wait to see
what SiteWise can do.

- Customers can collect
data from their plant floor,

or any edge location,
structure it, visualize it,
and generate realtime KPIs.

- We've been doing this
tens of years with some

of the largest logistics ever,
and the largest automation.

I think our customers are gonna
love taking all those years

of learning and putting
it into our product

that they can use and
leverage immediately.

- Imagine, they can
use SiteWise to monitor

multiple facilities or
create apps in minutes

so that their plant operators
can analyze equipment data

and prevent costly issues
like gaps in production.

- You know, I've got a
lot of mechanical systems
throughout my house.

I could automate all of that
and get SiteWise to show me

how everything's running
and how to maintain it.

- Bear in mind, we built this
for large scale industrial use

cases like individual plants
with tens of thousands

of different pieces of
equipment and sensors

whose data needs to securely
reach the cloud so that

you can monitor each of them
from a central location and -
- Cool.
I'd love to get started on that.
Let's see what we can do.
- Bill?
Bill, are you there?
(drill buzzes)
Bill, what are you up to?
(drills buzz)
(upbeat music)

- Sorry, sorry, I didn't
mean to leave you behind,
but I got a little excited.

I'm connecting my AWS Snowcone
to the network right now.
- That's a great idea.
Let me add that gateway for you.
(upbeat funky music)
Done.
I just sent you a link to the dashboard
with your temperature readings.

- It's really exciting to
see what SiteWise can do,

not just on this simple
environment around my house,
but across your whole production line that
a customer could have.
It allows you to get

the sensors connected
into the cloud quickly,

allow you to visualize it
and see what's going on,

understand the maintenance
level of your machines,

do predictive maintenance,
apply machine learning.
It's very exciting.

- Let me show you the web
app we built in less time
than it took you to do all those things.
- Wow.
This is exciting.

I think the customers
are gonna love SiteWise.
- Wait, something is wrong.

Your pond temperature sensor
is no longer transmitting.
- Even SiteWise can't predict a puppy.
